Author: skinnylittlebird
Text: I think you may want to tell him what’s happening and y’all about what you should do together. I used to have this same situation with my boyfriend, but after telling him about it and sitting down and talking, it turned out to be a lot less scary than I thought. I still feel the urge to restrict when I see him, but it’s getting better. Just try talking about it with him honestly and seeing what to do after that. If he agrees that you need to take some time off and work on yourself, then totally do it.
